abilities.name: Living Fortress
abilities.rule: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, this unit can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

abilities.name: Resolute Will
abilities.rule: While a **CHARACTER** model is leading this unit, each time an attack targets this unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Vexilla
abilities.rule: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.

wargear_abilities.name: Vexilla
wargear_abilities.rule: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.

wargear_options: ■ Any number of models can each have their guardian spear replaced with 1 castellan axe.
■ 1 model can be equipped with 1 vexilla.
